name: Exploring The Heart 3D CD
descr: Exploring the HeartÂ is the perfect learning tool for anyone who wants to learn about the basic anatomy, function, diseases, and disorders of the heart. Vivid 3D computer-generated images clearly illustrate the features of each structure. The easy-to-understand text links to corresponding subjects. Features include rotating and still 3D models, mouse-over labeling, interactive quissing, and a gallery of images to print and use in presentations Topics, include: anatomy of the heart, cholesterol buildup, atherosclerosis, hypertension, blood vessel damage, stroke, left ventricular hyperthrophy, angina, myocardial infarction (heart attack), congestive heart failure, mitral valve prolapse.
